website = http://www.ruzina.eu/ | footnotes = }} [[Image:Okres lucenec.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of Lučenec District in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]]]] '''Ružiná''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in the [[Lučenec District]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia]]
